text: La Llorona, also known as The Weeping Woman, is a 2019 Guatemalan French horror thriller drama movie directed by Jayro Bustamante and starring María Mercedes Coroy, Sabrina De La Hoz, Margarita Kenéfic, Julio Diaz, María Telón, Juan Pablo Olyslager, Ayla-Elea Hurtado. == Other websites == * * Category:2019 horror movies Category:2019 thriller movies Category:2019 drama movies Category:2010s horror thriller movies Category:2010s drama thriller movies Category:Guatemalan movies Category:French horror movies Category:French thriller movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jayro Bustamante
title: La Llorona (2019 movie)
